title: The Vigilantes
description: Having failed to purchase the human girl Cali, Draven sets off on a journey to find her. One way or another he intends to gain possession of her, despite her master's refusal to sell and the band of vigilante humans he stumbles upon while searching. If he means to escape the humans, first he'll have to convince them of his humanity--or give it up and outwit them at their own brutal games.
author: Lena Hillbrand
